data.text: Ɛberɛ a Awurade gyee Dawid firii nʼatamfoɔ nyinaa ne Saulo nsam akyi no, ɔtoo saa dwom yi de yii Awurade ayɛ.
Nsɛm a ɛwɔ dwom no mu nie:
me Onyankopɔn yɛ me botan; ne mu na menya banbɔ.
“Mesu frɛ Awurade; ɔno na ayɛyie sɛ no,
Owuo asorɔkye twaa me ho hyiaeɛ;
Damena nhoma kyekyeree me;
“Na mʼamanehunu mu no, mesu mefrɛɛ Awurade.
Na asase wosoeɛ na ɛhinhimeɛ;
Wisie firii ne hwene mu;
Ɔfirii ɔsoro baa fam;
Ɔte Kerubim so tuiɛ;
Ɔde sum kataa ne ho hyiaeɛ,
Hann kɛseɛ hyerɛn wɔ nʼanim,
Awurade bobɔɔ mu firi soro;
Ɔtoo nʼagyan maa nʼatamfoɔ hweteeɛ;
Awurade kasaeɛ,
“Ɔfiri ɔsoro baa ɛfam bɛsɔɔ me mu;
Ɔgyee me firii mʼatamfoɔ a wɔyɛ den nsam,
Wɔbaa me so wɔ mʼamanehunu da mu,
Ɔde me baa baabi a banbɔ wɔ;
“Awurade ne me adi no sɛdeɛ me tenenee teɛ;
Ɛfiri sɛ, manante Awurade akwan so;
Ne mmara nyinaa gu mʼanim;
Me ho nni asɛm wɔ Onyankopɔn anim;
Awurade tuaa me papayɛ so ka,
“Woda wo ho adi sɛ ɔnokwafoɔ kyerɛ wɔn a wɔdi nokorɛ,
Woyi wo kronkronyɛ kyerɛ ɔkronkronni,
Wogye ahobrɛasefoɔ,
Ao Awurade, woyɛ me kanea.
Wʼahoɔden a wode ma me enti, metumi ka akodɔm gu;
“Onyankopɔn deɛ, nʼakwan yɛ pɛ;
Hwan ne Onyankopɔn, gye sɛ Awurade?
Onyankopɔn ne mʼaban a ɛyɛ den;
Ɔma mʼanammɔn ho yɛ hare sɛ ɔforoteɛ deɛ;
Ɔsiesie me ma ɔko;
Woama me wo nkwagyeɛ kyɛm.
Woabɔ ɛkwan tɛtrɛɛ ama me nan
“Metaa mʼatamfoɔ so sɛee wɔn;
Meyamoo wɔn, mebɔɔ wɔn hwee fam, na wɔantumi ansɔre;
Wohyɛɛ me ahoɔden maa ɔko;
Womaa wɔdanee wɔn ani dwaneeɛ,
Wɔsu pɛɛ mmoa, nanso obiara ammɛgye wɔn.
Meyamoo wɔn ma wɔyɛɛ sɛ asase so mfuturo;
“Womaa me nkonimdie wɔ wɔn a wɔbɔ me kwaadu so.
Ananafoɔ brɛ wɔn ho ase ma me;
Wɔn nyinaa bɔ huboa,
“Awurade te ase! Ayɛyi nka me botan,
Ɔno ne Onyankopɔn a ɔtɔ wɔn a wɔha me so awere;
na ɔgye me firi mʼatamfoɔ nsam.
Ao Awurade yei enti, mɛkamfo wo wɔ amanaman mu nyinaa;
“Wode nkonimdie akɛseɛ ama wo ɔhene;
